name.ja: <ruby>強<rt>ごう</rt></ruby><ruby>欲<rt>よく</rt></ruby>で<ruby>謙<rt>けん</rt></ruby><ruby>虚<rt>きょ</rt></ruby>な<ruby>壺<rt>つぼ</rt></ruby>

requirement.en: During a turn you have not Special Summoned a monster.

effect.en: Excavate the top 3 cards of your Deck. Add 1 excavated card to your hand. Shuffle the other cards into the Deck. This turn, you cannot Special Summon monsters, nor activate "Pot of Duality".
